articles.title: Google and YouTube treat BTS fans with birthday features and tribute video - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: "I purple you" seems to be the K-pop band's and Google's ways of saying "Happy Birthday" to the ARMY fandom.

articles.title: Oprah Winfrey's father Vernon Winfrey dies at age 89 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The senior Winfrey had a barber shop in Nashville for nearly 50 years, and was also a member of Nashville's Metro City Council for 16 years.
articles.content:
Oprah Winfreys father, Vernon Winfrey, has died at the age of 89.
Oprah confirmed in an Instagram post that her father died in Nashville, Tennessee, on Friday (Jul 8).

articles.description: In this week's instalment of Creative Capital, meet Tan Si En, 29, one of the youngest film producers in Singapore. Already, she has worked with celebrated directors, including Anthony Chen and Kirsten Tan.
